link_desc:
A Template for monitoring redis performance by redis-cli，including:

  • used_memory_peak
  • mem_fragmentation_ratio
  • used_memory
  • used_memory_rss
  • keyspace_hits
  • keyspace_misses
  • clients_pused
  • connected_slaves
  • connected_clients
  • instantaneous_ops_per_sec
  • aof_last_write_status
  • aof_last_bgrewrite_status
  • latest_fork_usec
  • rdb_last_bgsave_status
  • blocked_clients
  • rejected_connections
  • evicted_keys
  • keyspace_hit_rate

Installation

1. Add the userparameter_redis.conf to /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.d/.

2. Edit the redis-cli url,,, in userparameter_redis.conf.

3. Import the template, and associate with host.
author: zhangrongjie
